title: ImTOO DVD Subtitle Ripper [v 1.1.14 Build 0509]
description:
ImTOO DVD Subtitle Ripper

ImTOO DVD Subtitle Ripper is dapper DVD subtitle ripper/converter, 
DVD subtitle creator and DVD subtitle extractor tool to rip DVD subtitle.
Download ImTOO DVD Subtitle Ripper to extract subtitles from DVDs freely!
ImTOO DVD Subtitle Ripper


*ImTOO DVD Subtitle Ripper is multifunctional DVD subtitle ripping software 
which can extract DVD subtitles and output subtitle files (formatted as IDX+SUB),
PDF, JPG and other image formats. You can choose to output one language subtitle 
or multilingual comparison subtitle in PDF or image formats.

*ImTOO DVD Subtitle Ripper features split function to separate DVD subtitles 
into several parts by specified duration. Before ripping, the software is 
capable of retrieving volume label, title and chapter info of DVDs from the 
internet. As a perfect DVD subtitle creation tool, ImTOO DVD Subtitle Ripper 
is designed to provide you with an easy-to-use and high-efficient way to extract 
subtitles from DVDs.

------------------
Key Functions
------------------
    * Rip subtitles from DVD-Video disc:
      Rip subtitles of the whole DVD-Video;
      Rip subtitles of all titles or some of them;
      Rip subtitles of all chapters or some of them;
      Rip all language subtitles , or some of them;
    * Rip subtitle from VOB/SUB files: Rip the all language subtitles, or some of them;
    * Split subtitle according to time: Support the user-defined time division;
    * Edit text subtitle: Edit the content of subtitle; correct the time;
    * Output multi-language comparison PDF or image files
    * Supported input formats:
      DVD-VIDEO directory
      *.VOB
      *.IDX+*.SUB
    * Supported output formats:
      *.IDX+*.SUB
      *.BMP
      *.JPG
      *.PNG
      *.PDF


Key Features

    * Rip subtitles with high-efficiency
      The DVD subtitle extractor supports ripping subtitles from various sources, 
      supports multiple output formats, and provides multiple options e.g. languages, 
      chapters, frame rates and time division etc.
    * Output the subtitle image file
      The DVD subtitle creator typesets the subtitle by A4 spec and output PDF files 
      or image files to make the browsing and printing easy.
    * Unique multilingual comparison forms
      For these DVD-Video discs with multilingual subtitles, ImTOO DVD Subtitle
      Ripper allows you to output multilingual comparison files, which brings more 
      advantage for your foreign language study.
    * Retrieve Disc info:Retrieve volume label, title and chapter info of DVDs from 
      the internet.
    * Multi-language version
      ImTOO DVD Subtitle Ripper has English, Japanese, German and Chinese versions released.


System Requirements:
System Requirements: 	Windows 2000/2003/XP and Windows Vista;
750MHz Intel or AMD CPU, or above;
512 MB RAM or more;
600 MB free hard disk space or more.
